articles.content: Bengaluru start-up KaleidEO Space Systems has completed aerial testing of its optical and multi-spectral earth observation (EO) payload. The prototype test, conducted aboard an aircraft over the UK a… [+1898 chars]

articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy Ring is one of the most highly anticipated releases of the year. From its design and specs to its price and more, here's everything we know.
